question: Recently, Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated India’s longest cable-bridge. The bridge is located in which state of India?
explanation: Recently, Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the India's longest cable bridge located over the Narmada River at Bharuch in Gujarat. The bridge is 1344 metres long and 22.8 metres wide located on the Ahmedabad-Mumbai National Highway. It is built by Larsen and Turbo as a part of the Rs 379 crore project of the National Highway Authority of India.
